jobs.title: Business Development Representative
jobs.description:
We are seeking a motivated Business Development Rep to join our dynamic team. You will be on the front line of our sales process, starting conversations and reporting directly to our co-founder responsible for sales. It is a great opportunity for an ambitious professional looking to evolve with the role and our company.

Your three primary responsibilities are:
1. Identify new sales leads
2. Pitch our services
3. Maintaining fruitful relationships with existing customers

**You will have to:**
* Be a fast and constant learner, always acquainted with the details of all of our products and the startup ecosystem
* Prepare tailored and substantive proposals, in order to translate leads into concrete business deals
* Research organisations and individuals online, to identify new leads and potential new markets
* Research and intelligence gathering on potential clients, identifying proper entry points and decision makers
* Contact potential clients via email or phone, establish rapport and set up meetings
* Plan and oversee new marketing initiatives
* Work with our marketing team to develop campaigns and strategies to grow the business pipeline and nurture prospects
* Attending conferences, meetings, and industry events as requested
* Monitor inbound communication and convert potential leads into opportunities
* Effectively manage your pipeline in the CRM, ensuring your data is well segmented and updated to a high standard
* Achieve target monthly KPIs
* Other tasks as required and requested by supervisor

**Our ideal team member will be:**
* An excellent communicator, with the ability present information concisely (written and verbal)
* An enthusiastic, reliable and independent self-starter, with great entrepreneurial spirit
* A multitasking guru who will maintain strict discipline with our processes and in the work they do
* An honest and supportive team player who genuinely loves the work he/she commits to.
* Have strong communication and IT fluency
* Able to handle pressure and meet tight deadlines
* Strong prioritising and triaging skills
* Attention to detail
* Creative talents and the ability to solve tough problems
* At least 6 months sales experience in a similar role. (Graduates welcome to apply).

**When you join our ranks, you can:**
Grow with a supportive, energetic and high achieving team
Work in a transforming industry selling a new type of services
Learn new ways of working, while developing your existing sales skills 
Super compensation structure with unlimited bonus
This position is remote, however some travel will be required to visit clients and meetings. Startup Venture Builder is an equal opportunity employer. We value and embrace diversity in all forms.
Basic £18,000 per annum + uncapped bonus (£35,000 OTE).
